body: You are skilled at using potions and elixirs to aid you in any situation. 1st-Tier Path Abilities—assured drinker, enhance magic items, transfer magic; 3rd-Tier Abilities—fickle attack; 6th-Tier Abilities—enduring elixir.
url: pfsrd://Mythic Adventures/Rules/Mythic Heroes/Trickster/6th-Tier Trickster Path Abilities/Trickster Builds/Alchemical Trickster
name: Alchemical Trickster
